attributes.action: Impeach boris, gain extension, general election on 5th november & 2nd vote.
attributes.background: British politics and democracy is broken and is plunging even lower with Boris Johnson in power. Us the public need to be heard and listened too. It's time to impeach Boris (our unelected leader) Gain a extension to brexit, hold a general election and then have a 2nd brexit referendum.

rejection.details:
We can't accept a petition calling for impeachment because this procedure is now considered obsolete. It's therefore not clear what action could be taken. 

You can find out more here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-7612

We're not sure exactly what question you'd like to be asked in a referendum. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions calling separately for the Government to seek an extension to the date the UK leaves to EU, a general election and referenda of various types. You may like to sign one or more of these petitions if they call for things you'd like to happen, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269499

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/266973

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253636
